body:
Freeze is the tools to transform plaintext or blog to static website. And we focus on use the **pure markdown syntax** to write your high quantity articles. ## Get up and running in seconds.

Terminal

~ $ pip install freezes

~ $ mkdir my-site && cd $_

~/my-site $ freezes new

~/my-site $ freezes

# => Now freezes will open browser to http://localhost:5500
excerpt: Freeze is the tools to transform plaintext or blog to static website. And we focus on use the pure markdown syntax to write your high quantity articles.

meta.summary: We focus to generate the high quantity web content.
meta.title: Home
